name: Kohl's Senior & Military Discounts
description: 15% off in-store purchases (Wednesdays for 60+, Mondays for military)
fullDescription: Kohl's offers 15% off in-store purchases for seniors (60+) every Wednesday and for military/veterans every Monday with valid verification.
whatTheyOffer:
- 15% off in-store purchases for seniors every Wednesday
- 15% off in-store purchases for military every Monday
- Applies to most merchandise
- Stackable with Kohl's Cash and coupons
- No minimum purchase required
howToGetIt:
1. Seniors: Visit any Kohl's store on Wednesday, ages 60+ eligible
2. Military: Visit any Kohl's store on Monday with valid military ID
3. Inform cashier you qualify for discount
4. Discount applied at checkout
5. Military includes active duty, veterans, retirees, and families
keywords: Kohl's, senior discount, military discount, veteran, 60+, Wednesday, Monday, retail, department store, 15% off
